_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the time-series event.

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The time when an event or observation occurred.

eventType.title: Event Type
eventType.description: The primary event type for this time-series record.

eventMergeId.title: ExperienceEvent merge ID
eventMergeId.description: An ID to correlate or merge multiple Experience events together that are essentially the same event or should be merged. This is intended to be populated by the data producer prior to ingestion.

advertising.title: Advertising
advertising.description: Information related to advertising activity in ExperienceEvents.

productListItems.title: Product list items
productListItems.description: A list of items representing a product selected by a customer with specific options and pricing that are for that usage context at a specific point of time and may differ from the product record.

commerce.title: Commerce
commerce.description: Commerce specific data related to this event.

directMarketing.title: Direct marketing
directMarketing.description: Events and properties related to direct and outbound marketing such as email, direct mail, texts, and in-app notifications.

environment.title: Environment
environment.description: Information about the surrounding situation the event observation occurred in, specifically detailing transitory information such as the network or software versions.

device.title: Device
device.description: An identified device, application or device browser instance that is trackable across sessions, normally by cookies.

placeContext.title: Place context
placeContext.description: The transient circumstances related to the observation. Examples include locale specific information such as weather, local time, traffic, day of the week, workday vs. holiday, and working hours.

fileDownload.title: File Download
fileDownload.description: Tracks all details of a file download. Extension of file transfer data type.

fileUpload.title: File Upload
fileUpload.description: Tracks all details of a file upload. Extension of file transfer data type.

implementationDetails.title: Implementation details
implementationDetails.description: The details of the software used to collect the ExperienceEvent.

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: The information related to marketing activities that are active with the touchpoint.

media.title: Media
media.description: Media activity information related to the experience event.

offerClicks.title: Offer Clicks
offerClicks.description: Counts the number of times an offer has been clicked.

offerDismissals.title: Offer Dismissals
offerDismissals.description: Counts the number of times an offer has been dismissed.

offerImpressions.title: Offer Impression Details
offerImpressions.description: An array of advertisements that have been displayed to a customer.

socialContent.title: Social Share Content
socialContent.description: Tracks the page/content/value of the item being shared.

socialFollow.title: Social Follow
socialFollow.description: Tracks when a social follow event has occurred.

socialNetwork.title: Social Share Network
socialNetwork.description: Tracks the social sharing network in use, i.e. Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

socialShare.title: Social Share Event
socialShare.description: Tracks when a social sharing event has occurred.

userAccountSwitch.title: Switch User Accounts
userAccountSwitch.description: Captures when a visitor switches their account during a visit.

userCookieConsentAccepted.title: Cookie Consent Accepted
userCookieConsentAccepted.description: Tracked when a visitor opts-in to allowing cookies to be set within their browser.

userCookieConsentViewed.title: Cookie Consent Viewed
userCookieConsentViewed.description: Tracked when a visitor views the cookie consent information.

userForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
userForgotPassword.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the forgot password process.

userForgotUsername.title: Forgot Username
userForgotUsername.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the forgot username process.

userLogin.title: Visitor Login
userLogin.description: Counter event indicating a successful visitor login.

userLoginBiometric.title: Biometric Authentication
userLoginBiometric.description: Flag determining if the user has used a biometric authentication process to login.

userLoginFailure.title: Visitor Login Failure
userLoginFailure.description: Counter event indicating a failed visitor login attempt.

userLoginLocation.title: Login Page Location
userLoginLocation.description: When multiple login locations exist on the page, this value should be used to identify the specific location the user used for login

userLoginKeychain.title: Keychain
userLoginKeychain.description: Flag determining if the user has used a keychain authentication process to login.

userLoginMultiFactor.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
userLoginMultiFactor.description: Flag determining if the user has used a multi-factor authentication process to login.

userLoginStatus.title: Login Status
userLoginStatus.description: Used to track the current login status for site visitors, regardless of whether login occurred as a result of a login during the current session or a previous session as identified by a cookie value.

userLoginThirdParty.title: Login with Third Party
userLoginThirdParty.description: Counter event that is incremented when a visitor has used another login network to authenticate, such as Apple, Facebook, or Google.

userLoginThirdPartySite.title: Third Party Login Site
userLoginThirdPartySite.description: Tracks the site used to authetnicate when a third-party sign-in event is tracked.

userLogout.title: Visitor Logout
userLogout.description: Counter event indicating a successful visitor logout.

userResetPassword.title: Reset Password
userResetPassword.description: Counter event when a visitor begins the reset password process.

userSessionTimeout.title: Session Timeout
userSessionTimeout.description: Tracked when a visitor has an authenticated session that is automatically logged out after a predetermined amount of time.

userUpdate.title: Account Profile Update
userUpdate.description: Counter event indicating a user has updated their account profile.

web.title: Web
web.description: The information related to web page and link of the ExperienceEvent.

surveyAnswers.title: Survey Answers
surveyAnswers.description: An array of the answers provided by the visitor within a survey.

surveyID.title: Survey ID
surveyID.description: ID for the specific survey taken.

surveyQuestions.title: Survey Questions
surveyQuestions.description: An array of the questions presented to the visitor within a survey.

alertClicks.title: Alert Clicks
alertClicks.description: Counts the number of times an alert has been clicked.

alertDismissals.title: Alert Dismissals
alertDismissals.description: Counts the number of times an alert has been dismissed.

alertImpressions.title: Alert Impression Details
alertImpressions.description: An array of alerts that have been displayed to a customer.

chatDeclined.title: Chat Declined
chatDeclined.description: Captured when an offered chat is declined by a visitor.

chatEnd.title: Chat End
chatEnd.description: Captured when a chat is ended with a visitor.

chatOffered.title: Chat Offered
chatOffered.description: Captures the number of times a chat session has been offered to a visitor.

chatSessionID.title: Chat Session ID
chatSessionID.description: Captures the chat session identifier, if available.

chatStart.title: Chat Start
chatStart.description: Captured when a chat is initiated with a visitor.

clickToCall.title: Click to Call
clickToCall.description: Visitor initiates a call to the client from a telephone number link on the site/app.

clickToDirectMessage.title: Click to Direct Message
clickToDirectMessage.description: Visitor initiates a direct message or feedback to the client from a direct message form on the site/app.

clickToEmail.title: Click to Email
clickToEmail.description: Visitor initiates an email to the client from an email link on the site/app.

clickToText.title: Click to Text
clickToText.description: Visitor initiates a SMS/text message to the client from a SMS/text link on the site/app.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: Subject of contact requested by the visitor, such as in-store purchase support, online order support, credit customer service, etc.

callBackNumber.title: Call Back Contact Information
callBackNumber.description: The contact phone number the visitor uses for responses to contact requests.

replyToEmailAddress.title: Reply to Email Address
replyToEmailAddress.description: The email address the visitor uses for responses to contact requests.

deliveryPartners.title: Delivery Partners
deliveryPartners.description: Delivery partners available from the restaurant.

diningOptions.title: Dining Options
diningOptions.description: Delivery and dining options available from the restaurant.

groupReservation.title: Group Reservation
groupReservation.description: Indicates if the reservation is being made for a group.

loyaltyID.title: Loyalty ID
loyaltyID.description: Includes the loyalty/rewards program ID for the party listed in the reservation.

partySize.title: Party Size
partySize.description: Number of individuals in the dining party.

priceCategory.title: Price Category
priceCategory.description: Price category for the reservation being made.

reservationTime.title: Reservation Time
reservationTime.description: The time for which the dining reservation is booked.

specialOccasion.title: Special Occasion
specialOccasion.description: Indicates if the reservation is being made for a special occasion.

ancillaryRevenue.title: Ancillary Revenue
ancillaryRevenue.description: Protection and equipment revenue associated with a reservation.

cancellation.title: Cancellation
cancellation.description: Tracked when a reservation has been cancelled.

created.title: Created
created.description: Tracked when a reservation has been created.

currencyCode.title: Currency Code
currencyCode.description: Currency code used to make the purchase. ISO 4217 currency code.

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: The end drop-off/return/check-out date of the reservation.

itemComparison.title: Item Comparison
itemComparison.description: Used to track room, flight, vehicle, or restaurant comparisons on a site or an app.

length.title: Length
length.description: Tracks the total number of days for a reservation.

modification.title: Modification
modification.description: Captured when a reservation has been modified.

modificationDate.title: Modification Date
modificationDate.description: Tracks when a reservation has been modified.

nonRefundableAmount.title: Non-Refundable Amount
nonRefundableAmount.description: Amount of the reservation price that is marked as non-refundable.

numberOfAdults.title: Number of Adults
numberOfAdults.description: Captures the number of adults associated with the reservation.

numberOfChildren.title: Number of Children
numberOfChildren.description: Captures the number of children associated with the reservation.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: Tracks the purpose of the reservation, typically either business or personal.

rackrate.title: Rack Rate
rackrate.description: Cost for the same day reservation without prior booking arrangements.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: The start pick-up/outbound/check-in date of the reservation.

triptype.title: Trip Type
triptype.description: Indicates if the reservation is for a one way, round trip, or multi-city.

type.title: Type
type.description: Records the type of reservation being placed.

arrivalLocation.title: Arrival Location
arrivalLocation.description: Tracks the arrival city airport code.

departureLocation.title: Departure Location
departureLocation.description: Tracks the departure city airport code.

fareClass.title: Fare Class
fareClass.description: The fare class of the flight being reserved.

flightDate.title: Flight Date
flightDate.description: The date of the flight being reserved.

loyaltyID.title: Loyalty ID
loyaltyID.description: Includes the loyalty/rewards program ID for the passenger listed in the reservation.

passenger.title: Passenger
passenger.description: Passenger info associated with the reservation.

securityScreening.title: Security Screening
securityScreening.description: Type of security screening the passenger is subject to.

agentID.title: Agent ID
agentID.description: Agent ID associated with the hotel booking.

averageDailyPrice.title: Average Daily Price
averageDailyPrice.description: Average daily price of the hotel room.

basePrice.title: Base Price
basePrice.description: Base price before any discounts are added.

bookingID.title: Booking ID
bookingID.description: Booking ID associated with the hotel booking.

checkInDate.title: Check-In Date
checkInDate.description: The check-in date of the for the room reservation.

checkOutDate.title: Check-Out Date
checkOutDate.description: The check-out date of the for the room reservation.

couponCode.title: Coupon Code
couponCode.description: Coupon code associated with the hotel booking.

discountPercent.title: Discount Percent
discountPercent.description: Discount percentage associated with the booking.

freeCancelation.title: Free Cancelation
freeCancelation.description: Yes/no if the room has a free cancellation.

guestID.title: Guest ID
guestID.description: Guest ID associated with the hotel booking.

loyaltyID.title: Loyalty ID
loyaltyID.description: Includes the loyalty/rewards program ID for the passenger listed in the reservation.

numberOfRooms.title: Number of Rooms
numberOfRooms.description: Captures the number of rooms associated with the reservation.

propertyID.title: Property ID
propertyID.description: Identifier of the hotel/resort for the reservation.

propertyName.title: Property Name
propertyName.description: Name of the hotel/resort for the reservation.

ratePlan.title: Rate Plan
ratePlan.description: The rate deal on which the room was sold.

refundable.title: Refundable
refundable.description: Yes/no if the room is refundable.

roomAccessibilityType.title: Room Accessibility Type
roomAccessibilityType.description: Type of accessible room, such as mobility, hearing, or other.

roomCapacity.title: Room Capacity
roomCapacity.description: Number of people the hotel room holds.

roomType.title: Room Type
roomType.description: Captures the type of room being reserved.

smoking.title: Smoking
smoking.description: Yes/no if the room allows smoking.

couponCode.title: Coupon Code
couponCode.description: Coupon code associated with the vehicle booking.

vehicleDifferentDropoffLocation.title: Different Drop-off Location
vehicleDifferentDropoffLocation.description: Indicates if a vehicle reservation has a different drop-off location than the pick-up location.

discountPercent.title: Discount Percent
discountPercent.description: Discount percentage associated with the booking.

dropOffDateTime.title: Drop-off Date & Time
dropOffDateTime.description: The drop-off date & time of the for the vehicle reservation.

vehicleDropOffLocationCode.title: Drop-off Location Code
vehicleDropOffLocationCode.description: The airport location code for the vehicle drop off.

freeCancelation.title: Free Cancelation
freeCancelation.description: Yes/no if the car booking has a free cancellation.

guestID.title: Guest ID
guestID.description: Guest ID associated with the vehicle booking.

loyaltyID.title: Loyalty ID
loyaltyID.description: Includes the loyalty/rewards program ID for the passenger listed in the reservation.

payLaterEligible.title: Pay Later Eligible
payLaterEligible.description: Yes/no if the booking is eligible to be paid later.

pickUpDateTime.title: Pick-up Date & Time
pickUpDateTime.description: The pick-up date & time of the for the vehicle reservation.

vehiclePickUpLocationCode.title: Pick-up Location Code
vehiclePickUpLocationCode.description: The airport location code for the vehicle pick up.

prePaid.title: Pre Paid
prePaid.description: Yes/no if the booking is pre-paid

productID.title: Product ID
productID.description: The product ID associated with the booking.

refundable.title: Refundable
refundable.description: Yes/no if the car booking is refundable.

rentersAge.title: Renter's Age
rentersAge.description: Age of the renter on the vehicle reservation.

vehicleClass.title: Vehicle Class
vehicleClass.description: The class/category of vehicle being reserved.

checkedBags.title: Checked Bags
checkedBags.description: Tracks the number of bags checked for a flight.

checkedPassengers.title: Checked Passengers
checkedPassengers.description: Tracks the number of passengers checked in for a flight, if multiple passengers exist for the same reservation number.

checkInMethod.title: Check In Method
checkInMethod.description: Tracks the method used to check in i.e. counter, online, kiosk, or self-service.

arrivalLocation.title: Arrival Location
arrivalLocation.description: Tracks the arrival city or airport code.

departureLocation.title: Departure Location
departureLocation.description: Tracks the departure city or airport code.

couponCode.title: Coupon Code
couponCode.description: Coupon/promo code string used in a reservation search.

groupCode.title: Group Code
groupCode.description: Group code string used in a reservation search.

isFlexible.title: Reservation Search Is Flexibile
isFlexible.description: Tracks if a visitor selects a flexible date option for their reservation search.

productCode.title: Corporate Code
productCode.description: Corporate code string used in a reservation search.

rateType.title: Rate Type
rateType.description: Type of rate included in a reservation search.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: The start pick-up/outbound/check-in date of the reservation search.

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: The end drop-off/return/check-out date of the reservation search.

upgradeOffer.title: Upgrade Offer
upgradeOffer.description: Extension of offer details data type.

upsellOffer.title: Upsell Offer
upsellOffer.description: Extension of offer details data type.
